text:
<speak>
To check 
<break time="200ms"/>
if your device has Easy Roam, text 
<break time="300ms"/>
<prosody rate="slow">
<say-as interpret-as="characters">
RATES 
</say-as>
to 
<say-as interpret-as="telephone">
7626 
</say-as>
</prosody>
<break time="200ms"/>
or, if you want to enable Easy Roam, text 
<break time="300ms"/>
<prosody rate="slow">
<say-as interpret-as="characters">
TRAVEL 
</say-as>
to 
<say-as interpret-as="telephone">
7626 
</say-as>.
</prosody>
<emphasis level="strong">Easy Roam needs to be added to every line on the account that will be travelling.</emphasis>
</speak>

<speak>
Pour vérifier  
<break time="200ms"/>
si vous disposez de l'option Voyagez Connecté, texter 
<break time="300ms"/>
<prosody rate="slow">
<say-as interpret-as="characters">
TARIFS  
</say-as>
aux 
<say-as interpret-as="characters">
7626 
</say-as>
</prosody>
<break time="200ms"/>
ou, pour l’activer au besoin, texter 
<break time="300ms"/>
<prosody rate="slow">
<say-as interpret-as="characters">
VOYAGE 
</say-as>
aux 
<say-as interpret-as="characters">
7626 
</say-as>.
</prosody>
<emphasis level="strong">Voyagez Connecté doit être ajouté à chaque ligne du compte qui voyagera.</emphasis>
</speak>
